Amplified.Description: Super Effective Attacks deal 25% extra damage.

Antidote.Description: The Coromon builds up an antidote over time which can cure Squad members from poison.

Brave.Description: This coromon is so brave that it can not be affected by curse.

Bright Light.Description: The Coromon emanates a bright light, blocking Twilight and lighting up caves.

Caffeinated.Description: The Coromon has more SP available.

Clean Retreat.Description: The Coromon is cured of all status problems when returned to its Spinner.

Clumsy Power.Description: Increase the Power of its attacks by 25%, but reduce accuracy by 10%.

Comeback.Description: When its HP drops below 25%, the Coromon makes a comeback, increasing its attack.

Conductor.Description: The coromon charges when hit by an Electric attack, increasing its Speed.

Coward.Description: When the Coromon receives a critical hit, it cowers and increases its Defense 2 stages.

Dark Atmosphere.Description: The Coromon starts twilight upon entering a battle.

Escapist.Description: This Coromon never fails to escape from a wild Coromon.

Fully Rested.Description: When the Coromon has full HP, any damage is reduced by 40%.

Good Aim.Description: Physical skills hit the right spot, increasing critical hit damage by 50%.

Gravity Pull.Description: This Coromon has such a big mass that it has (a) 25% chance to prevent opponents from switching out or fleeing.

Hoarder.Description: The Coromon sometimes hoards items it finds lying around the battlefield.

Inner Fire.Description: The Coromon has an inner fire burning so hot, that it cannot be frozen.

Lucky.Description: This Coromon is so lucky that it has an increased chance to critical hit.

Magnetic.Description: When a Spinner fails to catch a wild Coromon, this Coromon tries to pull back the Spinner to the trainer with a 50% chance of success.

Menacing.Description: The Coromon intimidate is opponent, lowering it Attack. Outside of battle it has a chance to repel wild Coromon which are much weaker.

Molter.Description: The Coromon sheds its skin after each round, giving it 30% chance to cure status problems.

Motivated.Description: Upon defeating the opponent, the Coromon gets motivated and raises its Attack and Sp. Attack.

Overclocker.Description: If the opponent has higher Attack, the Coromon overclocks its own Attack to match it.

Robber.Description: The spoils go to the victor. Steal some extra gold when defeating an opponent.

Sharp Claws.Description: Its claws are so sharp that lowering its Attack is impossible.

Slippery.Description: This slippery Coromon has an increased chance to dodge status changing moves.

Static Body.Description: Because of its static body, attackers making contact have a chance to get shocked.

Sticky Layer.Description: The sticky layer of the Coromon lowers the Speed of an attacker making contact.

Stinky.Description: The Coromon's stinky scent has a 20% chance to make the opponent
Coromon: . Outside of battle it has a chance to repel wild Coromon.

Strategist.Description: When the Coromon moves later than its target, it strategically finds weak spots and attacks with double Crit chance.

Supersensory.Description: The Coromon raises its most proficient stat when one of its stats is lowered.

Thick Skin.Description: Its thick skin makes the Coromon immune to critical hits.

Vaccinated.Description: The Coromon is vaccinated, which makes it immune to poison.

Vegetarian.Description: Fruit is healthy. The Coromon restores 20% HP when consuming Fruit.
